borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: The application is for a part outline and a part detailed planning permission for the following proposed development.(a) Phased demolition of existing buildings and structures (except Alton Activity Centre community building) (b) Mixed-use phased development ranging from 1-9 storeys above ground level comprising 1,103 residential units and up to 9,572 sqm (GIA) of non-residential uses comprising new and replacement community facilities (including library and healthcare facilities, youth facilities, community hall, children's nursery & children's centre) (Class D1); flexible commercial floorspace (comprising retail (Class A1), financial and professional services (Class A2), caf√©/restaurants (Class A3), hot-food takeaways (Class A5), business (Class B1), and community uses (Class D1) landscaping; removal and replacement of trees; public realm improvements access improvements; relocation of bus turnaround area; improvements to childrens play facilities provision of energy centre; car & cycle parking; and other highway works incidental to the development. All matters reserved except for Blocks A, K, M, N, O, Q, Portswood Place Nurseryand Community Centre and highway/landscape/public realm improvements An Environmental Statement has been submitted with the application under.
